name: Duelers
description:
Duelers... the rising card game taking strategists by storm! Assemble your deck of units and magic and take on opponents in this vast competitive world!

This game was developed for the SRPG Studio All-For-One game jam. All art was a joint effort between myself and AsheAllenArt. Though this project is meant as a one-off, look forward to seeing something similar but more polished in the future!

Thank you for taking the time to play my entry. Best of luck to all other participants!

Music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

Art: https://twitter.com/AsheAllenArt
